Package data.neighbors

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    KernelNSFUserInterface
    Same as NSFUserInterface, with a difference that implementing this interface indicates the neighbor sets are calculated from the kernel matrix instead - so the tester objects know which neighbor set finder objects to pass.
    NSFUserInterface
    This interface defines passing of the kNN sets and the associated statistics within the experimental framework.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    HitMissNetwork
    This class implements the methods for calculating the hit-miss neighbor sets on the training data in supervised learning.
    NeighborSetFinder
    This class implements the functionality for exact kNN search and kNN graph calculations, in various contexts.
    SharedNeighborFinder
    This class calculates the kNN set intersections between different points in order to later calculate shared-neighbor similarity/dissimilarity measures.
    SyntheticKNNExtender
    This class implements the methods for improving the estimates in the neighbor occurrence models by introducing synthetic data points as queries and querying the original dataset more times.
